title: Collaborative Learning-Based Language Argumentation and Concept Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Argumentative Structures and Experience with Scientific Thinking
context.additional_context: A process promoting conceptual development through collaborative argumentation activities based on simulated science experiments (forces unit) in VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept of force with ≥80% accuracy through structured argumentation with peers in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can present ≥3 valid counterarguments/supporting arguments during collaborative learning.
Learners can improve argumentation strategies in ≥2 ways based on feedback grounded in an argumentation coding system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
